homePage.slogan2: Educating the new generations about Bitcoin, Blockchain and open source technologies are the best way to empower them with the tools to build a better world.
homePage.developerDescription: Developers with technical background willing to become Blockchain developers.
homePage.businessDescription: Non-technical professionals willing to work on the Blockchain industry and/or use Blockchain applications.
homePage.whiteLabel: White label: the partner can use its own trademark in the courses while IOV Labs provides the content and examination tools.
homePage.trainingMentors: Training mentors: IOV Labs offers training for in-house mentors who can help students during the courses.
footer.rskDescription: RSK is one of the most secure smart contract network in the world and enables decentralized applications secured by the Bitcoin network to empower people and improve the quality of life of millions.
contract.mustConnect: You must connect your wallet in order to interact with smart contract
contract.notDeployed: Smart contract has not been deployed to detected network
quiz.subscribers: Only course subscribers can take the quiz.
